title: League patch keeps overdownloading
body:
First it started off as a 200 MB download and once it reached it stopped and then continued going over the limit.
I've closed and restarted the patch and now the patch download size is 18 MB but it's still going over it.


https://imgur.com/XKye5fr

replies.body: Hey, your network might be struggling and backtracking to pick up missed files yet failing to do so.  You should run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  If you're on a wifi, power cycling your router may help too or running on a wired connection.
